name: emergency
description:
The emergency command extracts emergency-related features from OSM data. Categories include:

- Services: fire stations, police, ambulance stations, rescue stations
- Medical: hospitals, clinics, pharmacies, defibrillators
- Infrastructure: fire hydrants, emergency phones, sirens, assembly points
- Safety: life rings, lifeguards, safety equipment

Includes contact information and accessibility data.

options.-c, --category: Filter by category: services, medical, infrastructure, safety
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Emergency features with:
- emergency_type: Feature type
- name: Facility name
- operator: Operating organization
- phone: Emergency contact
- opening_hours: Hours of operation
- wheelchair: Accessibility info
